data.app_name: TravelAR Slovenia - VR Edition: Discover Slovenia Like Never Before!
data.description:
Key Features:
Explore Slovenia's Heritage: Discover the cultural and historical treasures of Slovenia through captivating VR experiences.
Experience Historical Events: Relive significant moments in Slovenian history with detailed reconstructions.
Meet Local Characters: Interact with historical and cultural figures, bringing Slovenia’s past and present to life.
Learn and Discover: Gain deeper insights into Slovenia’s history and cultural heritage with interactive storytelling.
About the App:
TravelAR Slovenia is the product of a community-driven co-creation project that blends education with creative production, intersecting tourism and cultural heritage. This ambitious application is designed to foster educational growth in novel technologies, preserve cultural heritage, and promote tourism at both local and regional levels.
Constantly Evolving:
TravelAR Slovenia - VR Edition is in its initial stages and continually evolves with new content and features. By acquiring this application, you are not only supporting its ongoing development but also ensuring your inclusion in future content updates.
Support and Join the Journey:
Your support helps drive the creation and further development of this groundbreaking VR experience. Be part of the journey and stay tuned for exciting new content that will enhance your virtual exploration of Slovenia.
Download TravelAR Slovenia - VR Edition now and start your adventure into the heart of Slovenia's cultural heritage!

changelog.change_log: new locations and stations, BLED, FOREST
